Features:
- Add a details tab with allocations pie chart
- Annualized returns added on details tab
- Buttons for deleting quote, portfolio, transaction
- Update UI to be swipeable between tabs
- Tapping on a tab will scroll to the top
- Add a setting for setting starting portfolio tab

Bug fixes:
- Decimal input not working properly for countries that use comma separator
- Autocomplete sometimes not working for the same query
- List view does not update after deleting the last entry
- White theme display issue on allocations page

This release:

- Allow filtering out news publishers
- Long-press on list items will show context actions (for example, edit or delete)
- Add setting for showing currency symbol
- UI tweaks
- Bug fixes

Recent features:

- Annualized returns added on details tab
- Buttons for deleting quote, portfolio, transaction
- Update UI to be swipeable between tabs
- Tapping on a tab will scroll to the top
- Add a setting for setting starting portfolio tab

In this release, we made some tweaks and fixes to make the app easier to use:

- On the portfolios overview screen, only show portfolio name if the portfolio doesn't have holdings
- Show full quote name on quote summary page so it's not cut off
- Add a commissions toggle when adding new transactions
- Fix: Symbol display override not populating when editing a quote
- Bug fixes

In this release, we made some tweaks and fixes to make the app easier to use:

- On the portfolios overview screen, only show portfolio name if the portfolio doesn't have holdings
- Show full quote name on quote summary page so it's not cut off
- Add a commissions toggle when adding new transactions
- Fix: Symbol display override not populating when editing a quote
- Bug fixes

In this release, we made some tweaks and fixes to make the app easier to use:

- On the portfolios overview screen, only show portfolio name if the portfolio doesn't have holdings
- Show full quote name on quote summary page so it's not cut off
- Add a commissions toggle when adding new transactions
- Fix: Symbol display override not populating when editing a quote
- Fix a crash
- Bug fixes

In this release, we made some tweaks and fixes to make the app easier to use:

- On the portfolios overview screen, only show portfolio name if the portfolio doesn't have holdings
- Show full quote name on quote summary page so it's not cut off
- Add a commissions toggle when adding new transactions
- Fix: Symbol display override not populating when editing a quote
- Fix a crash
- Bug fixes

- Fix an issue where sometimes the widget shows 'unable to load'. Just tap the widget or re-pin it and the issue should go away.
- Calculate holdings using extended hour prices (see settings, calculations section)
- Bug fixes

- Fix an issue where sometimes the widget shows 'unable to load'. Just tap the widget or re-pin it and the issue should go away.
- Calculate holdings using extended hour prices (see settings, calculations section)
- Bug fixes

- Add more stats on quote details page
- Fix bugs

- Add more stats on quote details page
- Fix bugs

- On chart, show change percentage for currently selected range
- Logarithmic view on charts
- Add config setting for hide closed positions (default is to show)
- Chart and other bug fixes

- On chart, show change percentage for currently selected range
- Logarithmic view on charts
- Add config setting for hide closed positions (default is to show)
- Chart and other bug fixes
